snippet: Labor unions are in an existential crisis all across the country, which some recently fired cable television installers know only too well.
abstract: Michael Powell Gotham column holds that labor unions are in crisis across nation, citing story of recently fired Cablevision employees as egregious example; group of workers who recently overcame fierce management opposition and voted to join Communication Workers of American were summarily fired after asking a Cablevision vice president, during working hours, for a few minutes of his time to discuss contract.
lead_paragraph: Labor unions are in an existential crisis all across the country, which some recently fired cable television installers know only too well.

headline.seo: At Cablevision, Norma Rae’s Been Escorted Outside
headline.main: At Cablevision, Norma Rae’s Been Escorted Outside
headline.print_headline: At Cablevision, Norma Rae’s Been Escorted Outside
